io.vertx.redis.client

Class RedisException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.vertx.redis.client.RedisException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Deprecated.

    @Deprecated
public final class RedisException
extends RuntimeException
    Maps a redis error message to a JVM Exception type. Redis Errors have no trace so this throwable will not contain a stacktrace.
    Author:
    Paulo Lopes
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • is

        public boolean is(String type)
        Deprecated. 
        Redis error messages follow the sintax: ERROR_TYPE error detail message This method will evaluate is the given type matches the message ERROR_TYPE.
        Parameters:
        type - a type
        Returns:
        true if match.

      • slice

        public String slice(char sep,
                    int index)
        Deprecated. 
        Some messages are well formatted and allow extracting data from. This method will extract the indexed slice of the message given the seperator sep.
        Parameters:
        sep - a char seperator
        index - the desired index.
        Returns:
        the slice or null.
